title: FPGA-Based Digital Signal Processor
description: High-performance DSP system implemented on Xilinx FPGA with Verilog/VHDL. Features real-time audio processing, FFT algorithms, and custom IP cores for signal filtering and modulation.

title: Embedded IoT Sensor Network
description: Wireless sensor network using ARM Cortex-M microcontrollers with custom PCB design. Implements low-power communication protocols and real-time data acquisition for environmental monitoring.

title: High-Speed Data Acquisition System
description: Multi-channel ADC system with real-time data processing capabilities. Features custom analog front-end design, high-speed serial interfaces, and FPGA-based data processing pipeline.

title: Custom Microcontroller Board
description: Complete microcontroller development board with custom PCB layout, power management, and peripheral interfaces. Includes bootloader, device drivers, and development tools.
